text:
I tried to reproduce the bug with the attached test case with the following
queryString. ( same as the one that Ed provided )

http://jayashri.sfbay:8080/examples/jsp/bug8708.jsp?param1="value1"&param2="val
e2" and it worked fine for me. I tried with jasper and jasper2 and couldn't
reproduce the bug. If you still encounter the bug, please repond with a test
case and steps to reproduce the bug.
Thanks.
